Name: Hide Artifacts
Use: Tarrask is able to create "hidden" scheduled tasks by renaming the Security Descriptor (SD) registry value.

Name: Modify Registry
Use: Tarrask is able to rename the Security Descriptor (SD) registry subkey in order to "hide" scheduled tasks

Name: Scheduled Task/Job: Scheduled Task
Use: Tarrask is able to create “hidden” scheduled tasks for persistence

Name: Ingress Tool Transfer
Use: certufil used to download files from a given URL.

Name: Command and Scripting Interpreter: PowerShell
Use: PowerShell script is used perform various actions on the victim machine after being invoked by Windows Command Shell.

Name: Command and Scripting Interpreter: Windows Command Shell
Use: After running the initial Tarrask PowerShell script a Windows Command Shell is opened as a child process which then initiates another PowerShell process.

Name: Obfuscated Files or Information: Encrypted/Encoded File
Use: PowerShell script invokes use of `ConvertTo-SecureString` cmdlet to convert plain text or encrypted strings to secure strings.
